name: Humberto Segundo Rosas
title: Web UI Developer Sr, Software Engineer
summary: I am an accomplished software engineer, boasting an extensive 14-year background in analyzing, designing, developing, and integrating web application solutions. Proficient in Angular, React and Node.js. I excel in implementing enhancements to user experience and code quality. My attributes include being a fast learner, highly committed, and adaptable in various scenarios.

Developed new features for the platform and improve UX with error handle
Developed and refactored unit tests.

projects.title: Web UI Developer Sr, Software Designer
projects.name: Google(FA)
responsibilities: Integrated Chat Bot of Dialog Flow CX and highlighted it with React. That view is used in presales with clients.

Developed Video Advanced Search UI with NextJs, Material UI and React. Created a couple of components like: video player, carousel, form filters, modal, slide etc. Consumed Generative AI API to get videos where a text or image are sent to find videos that have those prompts.  The platform was shown in Google's Next 24 event and it got client demos for presales.

projects.title: Web UI Developer Sr, Software Designer
projects.name: Citibank - Support Wealth Program
responsibilities: Implemented Angular features for the wealth domain. Developed tiles to show transactions and holdings on the dashboard. Created charts to show the net worth of accounts. Created two learning modules to courses and articles related to investment.
Implemented new Angular features for the credit card domain. Developed forms where a customer can apply for a new credit card in citi.
Made unit testing in Angular.
Created custom components with Angular having ADA complaints. Tested all components with tools like NVDA and Axe to get quick feedback on ADA issues.
Implemented responsive design in Angular components.
Estimated user stories in grooming meetings.
Handled states with Ngrx in feature modules depending on the requirement.
Used RxJs operators to handle events between components.
Created Behavior Driven Development with cucumber. Created automated scripts to test acceptance criteria in user stories in browsers, androids and iphones.
Deployed and published feature modules using jenkins.
Managed release branches in bitbucket and code reviews.
Tested in production release for new features and fixes.
Mapped BDD scripts in Zephyr to run a bundle of scripts and reflect the result in the jira platform.
